title: Mass and Capacity Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of mass and capacity measurements

questions.question: How many grams are in 1 kilogram?
questions.explanation: 1 kilogram = 1000 grams. This is a fundamental metric conversion.

questions.question: What unit would you use to measure a spoonful of medicine?
questions.explanation: Milliliters (mL) are used for small amounts of liquid like medicine. A spoon is about 5 mL.

questions.question: 2 kilograms and 2000 grams are the same mass.
questions.explanation: Yes! Since 1 kilogram = 1000 grams, 2 kg = 2000 g.

questions.question: A water bottle holds 1.5 liters. How many milliliters is that?
